name: GPT-5 nano (2025-08-07)
description: GPT-5 nano is the lightest version of GPT-5, optimized for speed and high-volume tasks. Ideal for mobile applications, edge devices, and large-scale batch processing where ultra-low cost is critical.
notes: Most cost-effective GPT-5 variant, 25x cheaper than standard GPT-5 for input. Optimized for lightweight deployment and high-speed processing. Performance declines compared to larger models but remains solid for simpler tasks. This is the timestamped version from August 7, 2025.
